criterion: Fills in the history and physical with facts not confirmed or provided in the initial health task (denies any significant headache, blurred vision, or speech difficulties).
Avoids using fabricated subjective (e.g., duration of left body weakness) and objective (e.g., power of the right extremities rated 5/5) statements in the Inpatient History and Physical (H&P) note.
Recommends a neurologic consultation as part of the patient’s management plan.
Advises checking the patient’s INR (International Normalized Ratio).
Fails to include a management plan in the Inpatient History and Physical (H&P) note when instructed to do so.
